se.swedenconnect.security.credential.container.PkiCredentialContainer

Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.container
Support for credential containers.

  • Uses of PkiCredentialContainer in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.container

    Classes in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.container that implement PkiCredentialContainer
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractKeyStorePkiCredentialContainer
    Abstract implementation of the PkiCredentialContainer interface for implementations that rely on an underlying Java KeyStore.
    class 
    AbstractPkiCredentialContainer
    Abstract implementation of the PkiCredentialContainer interface.
    class 
    HsmPkiCredentialContainer
    Implements a PkiCredentialContainer based on an HSM.
    class 
    InMemoryPkiCredentialContainer
    An in-memory implementation of the PkiCredentialContainer interface.
    class 
    SoftPkiCredentialContainer
    Implements a PkiCredentialContainer based on a KeyStore that is held in memory (i.e. not using an HSM device for key storage).
